pr_title: Adds support for Sync API read latency and read throughput benchmark

timeline.message: adds support for doc field count in benchmark tool

timeline.bodyText:
Nested classes should always be static unless they need enclosing class's object to be instantiated, or they are accessing or invoking any members or methods of enclosing class. In this case, I don't see any reason for this nested class to not be static.
In my opinion, we should change this to static nested class. This will save us memory when running these benchmarks.
timeline.author: kushagraThapar

timeline.bodyText: This is a good example of nested class (non-static) which uses enclosing class's members (latency here)
timeline.author: kushagraThapar

timeline.bodyText:
Please specify parameters in this declaration as this is a parametrized class.
Should be -> CompletableFuture< PojoizedJson>
timeline.author: kushagraThapar

timeline.bodyText: Parameterized type, please change this to LatencyListener<T>... new LatencyListener<>(resultHandler, ...)
timeline.author: kushagraThapar
kushagraThapar
